# Xin
===

Xin is Single Page Application framework using javascript.

![Xin](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/faridlab/xin/master/graphics/logo.png "xin framework")

# Install

```
xpax init
```

to rebuild js and css
```
gulp
```

# Watch

```
gulp watch
```
